mapper.select: SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM reagent_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN reagent_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN reagent_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN reagent_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
SELECT DISTINCT ar.admin_id FROM reagent_role_resource_relation rr LEFT JOIN reagent_admin_role_relation ar ON rr.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}
